name: June Game (beta version)
description:
IMPORTANT!: In case a glitch occurs, use the "R" button to reset the game. 

June is a platforming short story game about a girl named June going on a hike in a world filled with floating islands. It is centered around quickly shifting your gravity and using it to your advantage in the levels.

June is currently is a Beta release meaning you may find bugs in the game. If you do, please email porterorvetti@gmail.com with what you find, or with constructive criticism. 

June is my first ever game, and it was created in Gamemaker studio 2. Because it was my first game, I used this experience to learn everything I need to create better games. The game I made turned out pretty rough, but will help me on my game dev path in the future!
